en-US.summary: A skill to help you narrow down colleges in the United States.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask college finder about Washington University
Alexa, ask College Finder about schools in Washington.
en-US.name: College Finder
en-US.description: College Finder helps you find the college that is right for you, matching your preferences with the public College Scorecard database to narrow down a list of schools for you to learn more about. You can fill out a profile, and do a quick search for schools by major, location, or name.
